entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat who has been knocked out and later goes back to sleep.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is picking up Scabbers by his tail and talking to Harry about Malfoy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being talked to by Ron and has met Malfoy before.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy's family is mentioned as one of the first to come back to the side after You-Know-Who disappeared.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is asking Ron and Harry if they need help with something.

relationships.description: Ron owns Scabbers, his pet rat.
Harry has met Malfoy before in Diagon Alley.
